name: Ranger Danger (OBCreative)
description:
Ranger Danger is a survival game - You will need quick reactions as the game progresses and speeds up.

Currently in Early Access BETA on Google Play.

Feedback welcome.

HOW TO PLAY
Move your finger around the screen, rotating the Ranger to dodge the Crocs. The longer you survive, the more points you get.

BONUS POINTS
Catch the special Golden-Fish!
You’ll occasionally see it shooting across the screen.

TIP
The crocodiles will attack slowly at first but the longer you survive, the hungrier they’ll become and the quicker they’ll get.
This survival game is simple to play but if you want to be the best you’ll need lighting fast reflexes.
